content: on your right needle again step 4 repeat steps 2 and 3 until all stitches are bound off ​ 5 bear lights shawl by snowy thistle knits pattern garter tab cast on cast on 3 stitches and knit 9 row turn work through 90 degrees and pick up 4 stitches from the long edge of your knitted rectangle one stitch in each garter ridge turn your work through 90 degrees again and pick up 3 stitches from your cast on edge 10 stitches on your needle set-up row marker placement k3 pm1 k4 pm2 k3 10 sts ​ garter section row 1 rs k3 sm kyok k until 1 st before marker kyok sm k3 14 sts ​ row 2 ws k3 sm yo k until marker yo sm k3 16 sts ​ repeat these two row another 13 times 94 sts dropped stitch section row 1 rs k3 sm kyok k1 *k1 wrapping yarn 3 times instead of once before ​ slipping stitch off the left needle repeat from * to 2 sts before marker k1 kyok sm k3 row 2 ws k3 sm yo k4 *k1 dropping extra two wraps from each stitch and allowing ​ ​ ​ new stitch to elongate repeat from * to 4 sts before marker k4 yo sm k3 row 3 rs k3 sm kyok k until 1 st before marker kyok sm k3 ​ row 4 ws k3 sm yo k until marker yo sm k3 106 sts ​ eyelet section written instructions see below for charted instructions ​ row 1 rs k3 sm kyok k2 *ssk yo k2 repeat from * until last 4 sts kyok sm k3 ​ row 2 ws k3 sm yo k to last 3 sts yo sm k3 ​ row 3 rs k3 sm kyok k to last 4 sts kyok sm k3 ​ row 4 ws k3 sm yo k to last 3 sts yo sm k3 ​ row 5 rs k3 sm kyok *k2 ssk yo repeat from * until last 6 sts k2 kyok sm k3 ​ row 6 ws k3 sm yo k to last 3 sts yo sm k3 ​ row 7 rs k3 sm kyok k to last 4 sts kyok sm k3 ​ row 8 ws k3 sm yo k to last 3 sts yo sm k3 ​ repeat row 1-8 a total of three 3 times to complete eyelet section 178 sts ​ ​ ​ ​ 6 bear lights shawl by snowy thistle knits eyelet section chart work chart three 3 times to complete eyelet section 178 sts or follow written ​ ​ instructions above work another dropped stitch section 190 sts ​ ​ ​ work another eyelet section 262 sts ​ ​ work another dropped stitch section 274 sts ​ ​ work another eyelet section 346 sts ​ ​ work another dropped stitch section 358 sts ​ ​ final garter section row 1 rs k3 sm kyok k until 1 st before marker kyok sm k3 362
